alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Weber and east central Box Elder Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 326 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willard, or 8 miles south of Brigham City, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Tremonton, North Ogden, Perry, Willard, Marriott-Slaterville, Bear River City, Corinne, South Willard, Riverside, Pleasant View, Farr West, Harrisville, Plain City, Garland, Honeyville, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville and West Warren. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 347 and 385. Interstate 84 between mile markers 37 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
